assetProfile.address2: Sukhumvit Road Bangna Nuea Subdistrict Bangna District
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: D.T.C. Enterprise Public Company Limited provides global positioning system (GPS) product and services in Thailand. It operates through GPS Tracking Business, Software Business, IoT Business, and Other Business segments. The company provides real-time GPS tracking system solutions, which includes current location, history route, and speed with real-time monitoring, as well as offers various reports, such as driver behavior, current location, vehicle usage, rout, the department of land transport, and other reports. In addition, it offers mobile DVR, which can be installed in and out of vehicles and monitor real time location and speed; and controller, which can monitor image and location through PC, tablet, and mobile to check driver behavior by preventing fraud behavior for all types of vehicles. The company also develops various software, which includes transport management solutions, business activity management system, online mapping system, administrative agency resource management, and agriculture resource management system. Further, it provides excise department gauge system; information technology system for internal office system development; information system and DVR camera system for fire engines and rescue departments; monitoring, controlling, and tracking system for oil handling along border zone, and to draw up database of liquor sale located close by or around schools. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Thotspol  Kunapermsiri
